item.description:
Trip to Guinea, Africa

For all those interested in learning about our Trip to Guinea in November 2009 with Sayon Camera, Fode Konate, Diaka Konate and more, come tonight! With slides and uplifting discussion, we will give you a lot of insight into what will happen on a trip like this. You will hear and see all of the experiences of trips past and how we do what we do! Yu will be impressed and we hope you will eventually join us on this trip.

Refreshments will be served.

Doors open at 6:45PM Plan on a 1.5 to 2 hour event!

Hope to see you there.

In rhythm spirit,
Alan Tauber, Director
The DrumConnection
The DrumConnection
781.648.0066
item.how_to_find_us: Doors open at 6:45PM and we'll welcome you with open arms!

group.name: Africa Travel Group! Learn Drumming & Dance in Guinea!

item.name: Trip to Guinea! Drum, Dance and Sing this November!
